name: Armour of Harmonic Existance
data: It decreases the users strength adequately.
It decreases the users constitution poorly.
It increases the users wisdom magnificently.
It increases the users intelligence adequately.
It has average armour class for its type (good in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration impressively.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It gives decent bonus to the spell 'harmony armour'.
It affects the user's spell knowledge.
